mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board (board_no, writer, title, content) VALUES (seq_tbl_board.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, v_board.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM tbl_board ORDER BY board_no DESC ) v_board ) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} AND (#{pageNum} * #{amount})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board SET writer = #{writer}, title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}

mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board SET view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
